content: the family slippers knitting pattern is a lovely classic model that is perfect for all the family this is a very simple slipper design very cosy and great for all the family you can knit them in a basic style or with a high ribbed leg for extra warmth they are knitted flat in garter stitch being the perfect project for beginners the step by step instructions have lots of photos and size colour codes to help you through your knitting project pattern information - available sizes 1y 2y 3-4y 5-6y 7-8y s m l xl xxl - construction knitted flat - experience level beginner - yarn aran weight yarn - gauge 17 stitches x 34 row = 10cm / 4 worked in garter stitch with 5mm us 8 needles - yardage 2 slippers approx 53-235 meters depending the size and version you are knitting - needles 5mm us 8 circular or straight needles and 4mm us 6 circular or straight needles if you are knitting the high ribbed leg version - knitting techniques knit purl simple increases and decreases - languages english and portuguese this is a digital file not the actual finished item you cannot resell my pattern however you can sell the finished item ©agasalhos e bugalhos all rights reserved if you need any information or have any questions regarding this pattern feel free to contact me i will be happy to help share your finished projects on instagram tagging @agasalhosebugalhos or #agasalhosebugalhos i hope you enjoy this pattern with love sandra
